column5: nye ɔman a wɔdɔɔ so sen wo a
column6: mma nnsuro hɔn: na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn a ɔdze wo fi Egypt asaase do bae no ka wo ho."

column2: "Na ɔmbra dɛ sɛ hom rehɛn akono a
column3: ɔsɔfo no ntwe mpin na ɔmbɛkasa nkyerɛ ɔman no
column8: hom rebɛn akono ndɛ da yi nye hom atamfo akɔko: mma hom akoma nntu
column11: nkyii so mma hɔn ho nnyɛ hom hu;"

column2: "na EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn nye nyia ɔnye hom rokɔ
column3: nye hom atamfo rokɔko ama hom

column2: "Na ahwɛdofo no nkasa nkyerɛ ɔman no
column4: Nyimpa mmuana na oesi dan fofor
column5: na ommbuei? Wɔmma ɔnsan nkɔ ne fie

column2: "Na nyimpa mmuana na ɔatsew wenyin ture
column3: na onnyae nnyii n'aba bi? Wɔmma ɔnsan nkɔ ne fie
column5: na nyimpa fofor eennkeyi n'aba no."

column2: "Na nyimpa biara a ɔagye basia bi dɛ yer
column6: na nyimpa fofor bi annkɛfa no dɛ ɔyer."

column2: "Na ahwɛdofo no nwɔw do nkasa nkyerɛ ɔman no
column4: Nyimpa mmuana na osuro na n'akoma apa? Wɔmma ɔnsan nkɔ ne fie
column5: amma no nuanom hɔn akoma eenntu dɛ n'akoma."

column3: sɛ ahwɛdofo no wie ɔman no kasa kyerɛ a
column4: wɔnhyehyɛ asafohemfo wɔ ɔman no ne tsir."

column2: "Sɛ ebɛn kurow bi dɛ enye no rokɔko a
column3: ɔno bɔ asomdwee ho dawur kyerɛ no."

column6: ma nkorɔfo a ibohu hɔn wɔ mu no nyinara mbɛyɛ ɔtowyiman mma wo

column3: na otu wo do sa a

column2: "na sɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn yi no hyɛ wo nsa a
column3: ɔno fa nkrantsee ano bobɔ no mu mbanyin nyinara:"

column4: nye dza ɔwɔ kurow no mu nyinara dze
column6: fa no afonam fa ma woho; na dzi w'atamfo asadze a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze ama wo no."

column2: "Dɛm na yɛ nkurow a wɔnye wo ntamu twe dodow nyinara a wɔnnyɛ amanaman yi nkurow bi no."
"Na aman yi nkurow a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo dɛ egyapadze no dze
column3: mma nngye biribiara a ogu ahom no nkwa:"

column7: nye Jebusfo; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ahyɛ wo no:"

column2: "amma wɔaannkyerɛ wo mma aannyɛ hɔn ekyiwadze nyinara a wɔyɛ ma hɔn enyame no bi; na hom aannyɛ bɔn enntsia EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn."

column3: dɛ ereyɛ ho sa afa a
column4: mma mmfa abɔndua nnsɛɛ no ho ndua; na no do aba bi na ibedzi
column5: na mma nntwitwa nngu; ana haban mu dua yɛ nyimpa

column2: "Ndua a inyim dɛ ɔnnyɛ ndua a wodzi no nko
column3: na sɛɛ no na twitwa gu; na sisi nduaban wɔ kurow a ɔnye wo dzi ako no ho araa ma onkodu dɛ ɔbɔhwe ase."
